TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but it is Equestria Girls.

I wish for a ride on a solid rocket booster

Granted but you are unable to hold on.

I wish that we a device that can change every human into a pony.

Granted. But every pony ate too much marshmallow causing a sugar deficit in the world

I wish for a fast computer

Granted, it's on a Formula 1 car.

I wish for a working Soyuz rocket

Granted the U.S takes away

I wish for a human to pony ray.

Granted, the ray is named 'Human to Pony'

I wish for a pillow

Granted but it is filled with "cupcakes"

I wish for a muffin.

Granted, it's only crumbs of it though

I wish for a Kraken

Well it eats your face off.

I wish that every human became a pony.

Granted, but only in an alternative universe where there are no humans

I wish for Chris Hadfield to go back to the ISS

Granted but he is on it when it deorbits

I wish for a pony.

Granted, it is in another universe though.

I wish for a wish

Granted but it kills you.

I wish I had a magic mirror that can take me to the alternate universe were humans are ponies.

granted, but it falls into lava

I wish for a 6-8-6 steam locomotive

Granted but kills you.

I wish for a mlp pony.

Granted, it's a toy

I wish for you to stop saying kills you

Granted but it ends up being kill you.

I wish for the SUper speedy cider sqeezy 6000.

Granted, but it makes disgusting apple juice with rocks in it.

I wish for a atom

Granted you lose it.

I wish That i owned Sweet apple acres.

Granted, it's in your dreams though

I wish I was able to split an atom

Granted but you die

I wish that my dreams took over earth.

Granted, it's only in your dreams dreams

I wish I can fly a rocket with MOAR boosters

Granted you die at takeoff.

I wish that earth was taken over by advance pony race.

Granted, it's in my dreams

I wish there was a time traveling man who was British

Granted but he needs to kill you because you cause the end of humanity.

I wish that the world became more like Guns of Icarus after World war III.
